p: Mean ± SE in figures and tables is based on untransformed data. All GLMs were performed with R version 2.6.2 (R Core Team 2008). Multiple comparisons of means (Tukey contrasts) for the GLMs were made using the multcomp package (Hothorn et al. 2008). The PCA was carried out with SPSS 17.0 (SPSS Inc, Chicago, IL, U.S.A.).
